title: UNO v3.6.5
description:
Play the #1 classic card game for fun with friends and family on your Android phone! The world-famous card game is faithfully reproduced for mobile and also features exciting new rules. Compete against friends in thrilling games: with a multiplayer mode that can be accessed 24/7 via Wi-Fi connection, playing UNOÃ¢â€žÂ¢ has never been so fun and easy, so be the first to get rid of all your cards!

- The UNOÃ¢â€žÂ¢ video game reproduces the classic gameÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s identity. All your favorites cards are here: Skip, Reverse, and more!
